title: How Much is an OCE team worth?
body: I have $20,000 to invest, so I would like to know how much of a share in Ownership I would receive if I invested the whole amount into a team like Exile5?

replies.body: Exile5 lmao, invest into a decent team, not a solo queue team

Hey Dungeon Warlord - CptStupendous will be releasing some information soon on how to reach out to Riot to declare interest - then we will assist in linking up interested parties to talk to discuss things like this :)

But to answer you actual question - no idea what the teams would be worth!
Thanks for your reply, Look forward to getting the information soon.

just looking for rough estimates at this stage, or even interested parties to go into partnership with. Contact me so we can form a business plan.  
email :- ja3ie@hotmail.com

Doesn't necessarily have to be Exile5, other teams may be interested in my funding also, as I said, I would like to know what an OCE team is worth.
A half finished bottle of coke zero and 15 durries.
